items.sentence: Tom told me that he didn\'t have any brothers and sisters.
The problem is Tom\'s complete unwillingness to negotiate.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t live in Boston anymore.
If you ever have any problem with Tom, I\'ll help you out.
I thought Tom would need help figuring out how to do that.
The police think that Tom\'s hammer was the murder weapon.
French isn\'t taught in our schools the way it used to be.
I get the feeling that Tom doesn\'t know what he\'s doing.
Tom doesn\'t think he\'s smart enough to get into Harvard.
Tom was afraid that someone would find out about his past.
Have you ever asked me a question that wasn\'t rhetorical?
Have you ever heard Tom play the guitar with Mary\'s band?
How do you know Tom didn\'t do what he was supposed to do?
I don\'t think you\'ll be able to persuade Tom to do that.
Tom is looking forward to seeing Mary this coming weekend.
Tom was speaking in French, so I couldn\'t understand him.
I\'m sorry that I said such mean things about you and Tom.
I\'m thinking of coming to Boston with my wife next month.
I\'ve already told Tom he needs be there tomorrow by 2:30.
I drove here from Boston as soon as I heard you needed me.
